definition[0]: a company or person that supplies shops and companies with goods
definition[1]: the part of an engine that sends an electric current to the spark plugs
definition[2]: a person or business responsible for making goods available to customers after they have been produced, either one that sells directly to the public or one that sells to shops etc
example[0]: We make sure that the distributors are always stocked adequately with the fast-moving standard items.
